channel.title: About the IATI TAG 2017 category
channel.description:
This category relates to the 2017 annual meeting of IATI's Technical Advisory Group (TAG). It is the primary hub for all notifications, consultations, details, and discussions relating to the meeting.
Note: 28/04/2017 The IATI Technical team has now gone through the first stage of reorganising the posts from the IATI TAG 2017- **Standards Day category** and moved them accordingly to the following categories under IATI Standard Management.  2.03 Decimal Upgrade Proposals  3.01 Integer Upgrade Proposals  Issues for Members Assembly  Modifications, Additions, Improvements

item.title: About the IATI TAG 2017 category
item.dc:creator: bill_anderson
item.description:
This category relates to the 2017 annual meeting of IATI’s Technical Advisory Group (TAG). It is the primary hub for all notifications, consultations, details, and discussions relating to the meeting.

Note: 28/04/2017 The IATI Technical team has now gone through the first stage of reorganising the posts from the IATI TAG 2017- Standards Day category and moved them accordingly to the following categories under IATI Standard Management.
 2.03 Decimal Upgrade Proposals
 3.01 Integer Upgrade Proposals
 Issues for Members Assembly
 Modifications, Additions, Improvements

Read full topic
